topic.title: Discuss (U2): Radiometric Dating
topic.text:
Chapter 4 discusses "radiometric dating," which is the process of determining the absolute ages of rocks, minerals, and fossils by measuring the relative amounts of parent and daughter isotopes.

  • Find an article on the Internet regarding the use of "Radiometric Dating".
  • Share the link in your Initial Post and describe the use of radiometric dating found in your article and its importance.
  • Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' initial posts by making a substantive comment regarding the content of the articles they have shared by Sunday at 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond using full sentences and proper grammar.
